message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, I'm the one making the first offer after all!
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, so how about a 55/45 split in my favor?
I'll meet you halfway on your previous offer, 57-43 is a fair compromise
This is getting us nowhere, Alice. I'll come up slightly to 56/44. Take it or leave it.
You barely moved, I'll try again. 58-42, it's getting closer to what I want
Okay Alice, I'll budge a little. 57/43, but that's my final offer.
